skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine ¨C U-101.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm U-101, one of the Iron Blood's 7th U-Boat Flotilla. I took part in four wolfpack operations. You could say that disrupting the enemy supply lines is my specialty - I even received a Knight's Cross! My hobby is going on long rides with Great Shark. Commander, wanna come with me?
skins.acquisition: Hey! You! That commander over there! How 'bout coming for a ride on my Great Shark? I'll show you a real thrillin' time!
skins.login: Commander, just hit me up next time and I'll give you a ride, okay?
skins.details: You know about those Union girls who call themselves "Solomon Knights" or something? Well, it has a nice ring to it... All righty, Commander, I'm an "Undersea Knight" from now on, got it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah, Commander, wait just a sec. I've gotta finish fine-tuning Great Shark. We can go afterwards.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Great Shark is land-capable, you know. Well, just not as fast. Don't ask why it works that way!
skins.secretaryIdle3: What kind of music do you like to listen to on trips, Commander? Have any recommendations?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hop on, Commander, and make sure to hold on to my waist tight! It won't be my fault if you fall off~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, welcome to the school band! Why'd I join the band? The reason's simple ¨C there's no Motorbike Club at school, haha! Just kidding~! Actually, I'm quite fond of music as well, heh.
skins.acquisition: Commander, welcome to the school band! Why'd I join the band? The reason's simple ¨C there's no Motorbike Club at school, haha! Just kidding~! Actually, I'm quite fond of music as well, heh.
skins.login: Commander, let's put on some music!
skins.details: It feels nice to kick back and enjoy some good music!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I recently started learning the trombone, hehe. I'm not very good at it, but it's still pretty interesting. Wanna listen~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: If I was able to play this thing underwater, I'd be able to perform for the fishes! Too bad, though... Guess I'll have to settle for the fish in the aquarium!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even though we U-boats hang out together regularly, studying together at school feels rather special!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, how about becoming the band conductor?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah! I almost smashed this over your head...
